pages.text: qul in kanat lakumu l-daru l-akhiratu ʿinda l-lahi khalisatan min duni l-nasi fatamannawu l-mawta in kuntum sadiqina
walan yatamannawhu abadan bima qaddamat aydihim wal-lahu ʿalimun bil-zalimina
walatajidannahum ahrasa l-nasi ʿala hayatin wamina alladhina ashraku yawaddu ahaduhum law yuʿammaru alfa sanatin wama huwa bimuzahzihihi mina l-ʿadhabi an yuʿammara wal-lahu basirun bima yaʿmaluna
qul man kana ʿaduwwan lijib'rila fa-innahu nazzalahu ʿala qalbika bi-idh'ni l-lahi musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi wahudan wabush'ra lil'mu'minina
man kana ʿaduwwan lillahi wamalaikatihi warusulihi wajib'rila wamikala fa-inna l-laha ʿaduwwun lil'kafirina
walaqad anzalna ilayka ayatin bayyinatin wama yakfuru biha illa l-fasiquna
awakullama ʿahadu ʿahdan nabadhahu fariqun min'hum bal aktharuhum la yu'minuna
walamma jaahum rasulun min ʿindi l-lahi musaddiqun lima maʿahum nabadha fariqun mina alladhina utu l-kitaba kitaba l-lahi waraa zuhurihim ka-annahum la yaʿlamuna
